# a\(n\) \= 7\*\(10^\(2n\+1\)\-1\)/9 \- 5\*10^n\.
https://oeis.org/A332172

## Maple
```Maple
A332172 := n -> 7*(10^(n*2+1)-1)/9 -5*10^n;
```
## Mathematica
```Mathematica
Array[7 (10^(2 # +1)-1)/9 -5*10^# &, 15, 0]
```
## PARI
```PARI
apply( {A332172(n)=10^(n*2+1)\9*7-5*10^n}, [0..25])
```
## Python
```Python
def A332172(n): return 10**(n*2+1)//9*7-5*10^n
```
